member.name: M:NewsAPI.Controllers.NewsController.GetNewsArticles(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Allows you to fetch news articles based on keywords.
member.param: Filter for title, description or content of the news article. Use commas to separate multiple keywords. Text between commas is one keyword and must match the result exactly. Only one keyword must occur in the article to be returned.
Filter for author's name. If provided, must match exactly.
If provided, returns the first N filtered news articles.

member.name: M:NewsAPI.Controllers.NewsController.GetNewsArticlesByTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to fetch news articles with a specific title.
member.param: Filter for title of the news article. Title must match the result exactly.
